```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(corrplot)

library(psych)

library(flextable)


#une fonction utile pour FA


flex <- function(data, title=NULL) {
  # this grabs the data and converts it to a flextbale
  flextable(data) %>%
  # this makes the table fill the page width
  set_table_properties(layout = "autofit", width = 1) %>%
  # font size
  fontsize(size=10, part="all") %>%
    #this adds a ttitlecreates an automatic table number
      set_caption(title, 
                  autonum = officer::run_autonum(seq_id = "tab", 
                                                 pre_label = "Table ", 
                                                 post_label = "\n", 
                                                 bkm = "anytable")) %>%
  # font type
  font(fontname="Times New Roman", part="all")
}

#et une seconde fonction


fa_table <- function(x, cut) {
  #get sorted loadings
  loadings <- fa.sort(x)$loadings %>% round(3)
  #supress loadings
  loadings[loadings < cut] <- ""
  #get additional info
  add_info <- cbind(x$communality, 
                    x$uniquenesses,
                    x$complexity) %>%
    # make it a data frame
    as.data.frame() %>%
    # column names
    rename("Communality" = V1,
           "Uniqueness" = V2,
           "Complexity" = V3) %>%
    #get the item names from the vector
    rownames_to_column("item")
  #build table
  loadings %>%
    unclass() %>%
    as.data.frame() %>%
    rownames_to_column("item") %>%
    left_join(add_info) %>%
    mutate(across(where(is.numeric), round, 3))
}


```

```{r 0605}

loading<-fa$loading
loading<-as.data.frame(unclass(loading))


scores<-fa$scores
scores<-as.data.frame(unclass(scores))

df_typo<-cbind(foo1, scores)

df_g <- df_typo %>% 
  select(matches("V_.*"), essround)%>%
  gather(variable, value,-essround)%>%
  group_by(variable,essround)%>% 
  summarize(value=mean(value))

ggplot(df_g, aes(x=as.factor(essround), y=value, group=variable))+
  geom_line(aes(color=variable))+
  facet_wrap(vars(variable))

df_g <- df_typo %>% 
  select(matches("V_.*"), cntry)%>%
  gather(variable, value,-cntry)%>%
  group_by(variable,cntry)%>% 
  summarize(value=mean(value))


ggplot(df_g, aes(x=reorder(as.factor(variable), value), y=value, group=cntry))+
  geom_line(aes(color=cntry))+ coord_flip() +
  facet_wrap(vars(cntry)) +  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
